title: A Java Exception has occurred
author: 末影猎人
txt_content: 打开启动器的时候就出现A Java Exception has occurred

replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content:
Java路径没写好@ECHO OFF
java -Xms1g -Xmx1g -jar <你的JAR文件名>.jar
pause复制代码
